name: Serenade of the Sirens
description: Serenade of the Sirens is a retro, rogue-lite, dungeon crawler. As a mermaid named Seika, discover the hidden mystery of the underwater cave.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 8.1, 10 Processor: Single Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo
